sentences.en: A lot of people in shipbuilding will get the axe.
sentences.cn: 造船业的很多人将被解雇.

sentences.en: Britain has lost her leadership in the shipbuilding industry.
sentences.cn: 英国已丧失在造船业的领导地位.

sentences.en: In February 1967 he introduced the Shipbuilding Industry Bill.
sentences.cn: 1967年2月,他提出了造船工业议案.

sentences.en: In the shipbuilding practice marine propeller is one of the key installations.
sentences.cn: 船舶工业中,螺旋桨是船舶的关键装置之一.

sentences.en: Industrial orientation: Neighboring - port services shipbuilding heavy industry and Hi - tech industry.
sentences.cn: 产业定位临港产业、船舶制造业、重工、 高新技术 产业.

sentences.en: Looking forward to planning out the ship industry, shipbuilding shares trading collective.
sentences.cn: 憧憬船舶业规划细则出台, 造船股集体涨停.

sentences.en: Shipbuilding used to be one of our major industries.
sentences.cn: 造船过去曾是我们的重大工业之一.

sentences.en: Shipbuilding: bilge water, waste oil, all kinds of fresh fuel.
sentences.cn: 造船业: 船底污水 、 污油 、 各种燃油淡水.

sentences.en: The economic depression hits shipbuilding industry badly.
sentences.cn: 经济萧条使造船业蒙受严重损失.

sentences.en: The shipbuilding industry is rapidly expanding.
sentences.cn: 造船工业正在迅速发展.

sentences.en: The shipbuilding industry of the south is rapidly expanding.
sentences.cn: 南方的造船业正在迅速发展.

sentences.en: There have been a lot of layoffs in the shipbuilding industry recently.
sentences.cn: 近来造船业已经有了一大堆裁员.

sentences.en: This shipyard is at the cutting edge of world shipbuilding technology.
sentences.cn: 该造船厂的造船技术处于世界最前沿。

sentences.en: We are relaunching Britain's shipbuilding with this new Bill.
sentences.cn: 我们要以这一新法案重整英国的造船业.
